page.title: 06SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: Every year, in July, there is a school sports day at Crynallt Junior school. The whole school is split up into 4 "houses", red, blue, yellow and green.There is a variety of events such as sprint, shuttle, relay, long distance running, sack race, egg and spoon race and obstacle race. Every child participates in at least one event and competes against children of a similar age. The sports are held on the football field and the long distance race is one lap for the youngest children , 2.5 laps for the oldest and 1.5 or 2 laps for others. Points are awarded for the first 4 places; e.g. 4 points for first place and one point for fourth place . The "house" with the most points is awarded the school sports cup. This year (1985) green won.1
